alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Collingsworth; Donley (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 7:13PM CDT until July 07 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Armstrong County in the Panhandle of Texas... Western Collingsworth County in the Panhandle of Texas... Donley County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 713 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles southeast of Goodnight, or 12 miles west of Clarendon, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. * Locations impacted include... Clarendon, Howardwick, Hedley, Lelia Lake, Quail, Greenbelt Lake and Goodnight. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
